DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Treatment Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomly administer either real ( n = 12 ) sham ( n = 10 ) rTMS , day , 5 day week , 2 week . Randomization perform accord computer-generated schedule . Subjects scale-rater physician blind treatment status individual . Only rTMS administrator aware group allocation . Treatment response assess self-and clinician-rated scale treatment , immediately treatment 3 month thereafter , examiner follow subject throughout study . All patient include study fail adequate pharmacological treatment least 2 antiobsessional drug . Their prescription drug continue without change dosage regimens throughout study .
DOC.criteria: age 18 60 year diagnosis obsessivecompulsive disorder ( OCD ) accord DSMIVTR criterion OCD least moderate severity ( YBOCS score 16 ) . subject comorbid psychiatric disorder ( except depression HAMD ) history drug abuse significant head injury , neurosurgical procedure pregnant woman patient metal implant illnesses prevent attendance session patient history seizure bearing pacemaker
